dc_title_s: New sectional map of the state of Illinois : compiled from the United States surveys.
dc_description_s: Includes description of "Public lands" and "Land districts.";  Vicinity of Alton & St. Louis. Scale of 4 miles to one inch. Vicinity of Galena, the lead region and part of Wisconsin and Iowa.;Washington.;1 map, colored;96 x 63 cm.;ca. 1:633,600
dc_publisher_s: J.H. Colton & Co. (New York), c1836 (engraved by Stiles & Co. (New York))
